verses.name: Leviticus 26:32
verses.text: And I will bring the land into desolation: and your enemies which dwell therein shall be astonished at it.

verses.name: Leviticus 26:33
verses.text: And I will scatter you among the heathen, and will draw out a sword after you: and your land shall be desolate, and your cities waste.

verses.name: Leviticus 26:34
verses.text: Then shall the land enjoy her sabbaths, as long as it lieth desolate, and ye be in your enemies’ land; even then shall the land rest, and enjoy her sabbaths.

verses.name: Leviticus 26:35
verses.text: As long as it lieth desolate it shall rest; because it did not rest in your sabbaths, when ye dwelt upon it.
